What_We_Know__c:
Currently, the "Rule Item to Handle" option in PingCastle requires users to apply the same rule separately to multiple accounts. This results in redundant configurations when managing multiple exclusions. It would be beneficial to allow a single rule to handle multiple values at once, enabling users to exclude multiple accounts in a more efficient way.

Proposed Enhancement:

Allow the "Rule Item to Handle" option to accept multiple values within a single rule.
Introduce functionality to add exceptions or action plans for multiple items simultaneously.
Current Limitation:

As of now, this is not possible due to the way it was originally implemented.
No existing workflow supports batch handling of exceptions or action plans.
